summary: Educated as a structural and engineering geologist, I developed into petrophysics and project management early in my career. I am a dedicated and pragmatic teamplayer with strong analytical skills, a wide perspective and great interpersonal competences. I enjoyed working in applied research, gaining satisfaction while working in integrated asset and well operations teams in an operational environment, and am looking forward to continue applying and broadening my experience to contribute to further development and utilization of (geo)energy.
